analysis.summary: A Vue layout component for the marketplace section that renders a two-column view: a filter sidebar and a dynamic content area. It displays the current user location in the header and synchronizes URL params/query with component state (filters, sorting, location).
analysis.purpose: Serves as the main wrapper view for all marketplace pages, handling UI layout, initializing filter options, reacting to route changes, and keeping URL and application state in sync.

components.name: BlockFilter
components.role: Renders the sidebar filter UI; bound via v-model to marketplace.state.filter and displays filtering options.

components.name: router-view / dynamic child
components.role: Placeholder for nested marketplace pages/components. Loaded via <component :is="Component" :localPosition="localPosition"/>

functions.name: denormalizeUrlParam
functions.purpose: Convert URL slugs (dash-separated, lowercase) into human-readable strings with spaces and capitalized words.

functions.name: normalizeUrlParam
functions.purpose: Convert human-readable strings into URL-safe slugs: lowercase, spaces to dashes, remove invalid chars.

analysis.usage: Registered as the route component for marketplace routes (e.g. /marketplace/:country?/:state?/:city?). Other components nest inside via <router-view>. Imported implicitly by the router definition in the marketplace module.
notes: onMounted hook fetches category list and injects it into the marketplace filter options.
Watches synchronize filter and sort state with URL query parameters, and global location state with route params.
I18n setup provides localized meta titles/descriptions for SEO.
The <style> block is empty but uses lang="scss", indicating future styling or global style injection.
